dutchsentence: Mijn vriend en ik werken bij hetzelfde bedrijf.
englishtranslate: My friend and I work at the same company.

dutchsentence: Ze gaat uit eten met haar vriendin.
englishtranslate: She is going out for dinner with her friend (female).

dutchsentence: Mijn collega helpt me met dit moeilijke werk.
englishtranslate: My colleague helps me with this difficult work.
Family is always the most important thing.

dutchsentence: Ik leer om te kunnen werken als manager.
englishtranslate: I am learning in order to be able to work as a manager.
Chatting with each other is fun/enjoyable.

dutchsentence: Dit boek is saai om te lezen.
englishtranslate: This book is boring to read.

dutchsentence: De laatste sms kreeg ik rond middernacht.
englishtranslate: I received the last text message around midnight.
I drink coffee early in the morning.

dutchsentence: 's morgens begin ik met mijn werk.
englishtranslate: In the morning I start my work.
In the afternoon we have a break.
She watches TV in the evening.

dutchsentence: 's nachts is het rustig in het ziekenhuis.
englishtranslate: At night it is quiet in the hospital.

dutchsentence: Wil je me bellen in de ochtend?
englishtranslate: Do you want to call me in the morning?
